00075 typedef struct PACK
00076 {
00077   ExtAddr_t addr;                   
00078   uint8_t   key[SECURITY_KEY_SIZE]; 
00079 } ZCL_LinkKeyDesc_t;

00087 typedef struct PACK
00088 {
00089   uint8_t                     publicReconstrKey[SECT163K1_COMPRESSED_PUBLIC_KEY_SIZE];  //22-byte
00090   ExtAddr_t                   subject;                                                  //8-bytes
00091   ExtAddr_t                   issuer;                                                   //8-byte
00092   ZclKEProfileAttributeData_t profileAttributeData;                                     //10-byte
00093 } ZclCertificate_t;

00100   uint8_t certificate[SECT163K1_CERTIFICATE_SIZE];
